amendment.description: Amendment sought to delay the date of enactment until the Secretary of Health and Human Services submits to Congress a report on the potential effect of this title on health care premiums.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-416 to delay the date of enactment until the Secretary of Health and Human Services submits to Congress a report on the potential effect of this title on health care premiums.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 228, 1 Present (Roll no. 123).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 228, 1 Present (Roll no. 123).
